scripts.postpublish: npm run docs-readme && npm run commit-update-docs
scripts.docs-readme: export NAME=`npm view . name`; export VERSION=`npm view . version`; ./node_modules/documentation/bin/documentation.js readme ./src/*.js --github --name $NAME --project-version $VERSION --readme-file ./README.md -s API
scripts.commit-update-docs: git add ./README.md && git commit -m 'Updated README API Docs' && git push
